Key Match Events: Mark Vientos hit a grand slam in NLCS Game 2
Others: Mark Vientos has 11 RBIs already this postseason, matching Daniel Murphy’s total from his historic playoff run in 2015. He’s one shy of the Mets record of 12, which Curtis Granderson (2015) and John Olerud (1999) share.
Mark Vientos' slam powered the Mets to a 7-3 win over the Dodgers in National League Championship Series Game 2 on Monday, evening the series at one game apiece.
